attributes.action: END THE  FEMALE  AGENDA OF SOME  MP'S!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is clear that some MP'S are championing female causes, at the expence of males,  many males feel like they are being treated as second class citizens,
eg there is a minister for women, but not for men!
 
 Equality yes! but true equality!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
